front.title: Antipersonnel Laser Cannon
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to deploy on your transport vehicle. If your warrior aboard here, may target a character or creature using 3 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.
front.lore: Rapid-fire weapon. Requires three power cells to operate. Has no stun setting. Lightweight enough to be stored and then quickly mounted when the need arises.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap
